timeline.bodyText: Are we sure, to remove checkboxes functionalities, if so, Can we delete this block, instead of commenting ?

replies.bodyText: This is a Checkbox component that we can use when we implement builk editing on the search page.  That's why I commented it out instead of removing it.
replies.author: xdavidson
